original_text: And what he did unto the army of Egypt, unto their horses, and to their chariots; how he made the water of the Red sea to overflow them as they pursued after you, and how the Lord hath destroyed them unto this day;
korean_text: 또 여호와께서 애굽 군대와 그 말과 그 병거에 행하신 일 곧 그들이 너희를 뒤쫓을 때에 홍해 물로 그들을 덮어 멸하사 오늘까지 이른 것과

sentences.original_text: And what he did unto the army of Egypt
how he made the water of the Red sea to overflow them
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 어떻게 홍해의 물로 그들을 덮으셨는지

sentences.original_text: and how the Lord hath destroyed them
